content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As we focus solely on the negotiation regarding rental price for this unfurnished 50 square meter apartment in the city center of Magdeburg, I'm open to discussing your perspective. However, my aim is to achieve the highest price possible. Let's explore the figures.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: To start off, I think a price of 400 Euros per month is quite fair for this apartment. It's in the city center and has all the necessary facilities nearby.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While considering your proposed price of 400 Euros per month for this highly desirable city center apartment, I must regretfully express my hesitation. I believe a slightly higher price would be more suitable, reflecting the apartment's prime location and features. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I think 400 Euros is still a reasonable price taking into account the unfurnished state of the apartment. What do you think about 380 Euros?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Although I appreciate your consideration of the unfurnished aspect, I still feel compelled to seek a price closer to my initial target. Unfortunately, I cannot accept 380 Euros per month as the rental price for this outstanding city center apartment. Let's try pushing the negotiation further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Yi-Nuo Wang. Given your insistence, I am willing to offer 390 euros per month. This is the lowest I can go for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While I acknowledge your determination to reach an agreement, reaching 390 Euros per month still falls short of my desired price range. Due to this discrepancy, I must communicate my reluctance to continue the negotiation based on this figure. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
